summary: In this documentary, the show's emcee, Vince Vaughn, and four stand-up comedians hand-picked by Vaughn, travel the country and perform in 30 cities. This film documents the interactions on and off stage along the way.
cast: Vince Vaughn|Ahmed Ahmed|John Caparulo|Bret Ernst|Sebastian Maniscalco|Jon Favreau|Dwight Yoakam|Peter Billingsley|Keir O'Donnell|Justin Long|Buck Owens
title: Wild West Comedy Show: 30 Days & 30 Nights - Hollywood to the Heartland
